MultiRowGridSystem.Overview: Heavy Weapon uses a sophisticated multi-row grid sprite system where: - Rows represent different states/types (weapon levels, enemy types, power-up types) - Columns represent animation frames or rotation angles - The DrawSprite function's param_5 (column) and param_6 (row) control selection

RenderingPattern.Step1: Calculate row index from game state (level, type, etc.)
RenderingPattern.Step2: Calculate column index from angle or frame number
RenderingPattern.Step3: Call DrawSprite with column as param_5, row as param_6
RenderingPattern.Step4: DrawSprite calculates sprite rect: x = width * column, y = height * row

BossAnimationSystem.Overview: Boss sprites use sophisticated multi-frame animations discovered through hex value analysis: - Turret rotations use 21 frames (0x15) for smooth targeting - Animated parts like wheels use 12 frames (0xc) for continuous motion - Eye animations use 6 frames for blinking/tracking effects
